full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 206 of 236 LC3Cmax7 Parkinson - cross 1110 1 I should say, and that's the red room; right? 2 A. True. 3 Q. And there is one just next to it called guest room 1, and that's labeled the blue room? 4 5 A. True. 6 Q. And there is one below that that's labeled guest room 2, and that's labeled the back room? 7 8 A. True. 9 Q. We saw all that in the video walk-through; right? We saw those rooms, I believe? 10 11 A. I believe so. 12 Q. Those rooms are all on the other side of the second floor than the master bedroom suite; right? 13 14 A. They are on the east side, the master is on the west side. 15 Q. And you can't tell from this floor plan who stayed in those rooms; right? 16 17 A. Correct. 18 Q. And you can't tell that from your video or the photographs either? 19 20 A. No. 21 Q. I want to talk to you about just a few other features of the house; all right? 22 23 A. Yes. 24 Q. Let's look at 298 again, what's in evidence as Government Exhibit 298. We're back on the first floor there; right? 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012720
